name: There's no escape !
description:
I did this for ludum dare jam, it's my first game ever. I'm hungry and I'm tired, please be gentle.

Arrows to move.

Walljump while pressing up and opposite direction of the wall (if you still can't do it try pressing all three directions at once while on the wall).

You can shoot a laser with space and change its direction horizontally by pressing space again and looking at the direction you want the laser to go at.
